column4: Hey, would any of you know if there is a way to get the bootsplash from 9.10 back in 10.4? I've been searching, and searching, google, ubuntu forums, etc. but to no avail.
Probably not new version has a new boot manager with it's own set of themes (plymouth)
Likely, but likely it's not worth the effort and instability it would resut in, I have no idea how, either (btw the term is boot splash if you are going to be googling...)
thanks :) I'll stay on the google
